lead_paragraph: Former U.S. Secretary of State Hillary Rodham Clinton told a Las Vegas crowd Monday night that more needs to be done to ensure young people can achieve their dreams and free students from onerous college debt "that can feel like an anchor tied to their feet dragging them down."

headline.main: Hillary Clinton: Don't Saddle Students With Debt
headline.print_headline: Hillary Clinton: Don't Saddle Students With Debt
